+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------+
| Markdown Syntax                         | Output                                  |
+=========================================+=========================================+
| ```                                     | *italics*, **bold**, ***bold italics*** |
| *italics*, **bold**, ***bold italics*** |                                         |
| ```                                     |                                         |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------+
| ```                                     | `verbatim code`                         |
| `verbatim code`                         |                                         |
| ```                                     |                                         |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------+
| ```                                     | ## Header 2 {.heading-output}           |
| ## Header 2                             |                                         |
| ```                                     |                                         |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------+
| ```                                     | ### Header 3 {.heading-output}          |
| ### Header 3                            |                                         |
| ```                                     |                                         |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------+
| ```                                     | <https://quarto.org>                    |
| https://quarto.org                      |                                         |
| ```                                     |                                         |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------+
| ```                                     | [Quarto](https://quarto.org)            |
| [Quarto](https://quarto.org)            |                                         |
| ```                                     |                                         |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------+
| ```                                     | -   unordered list                      |
| * unordered list                        |     -   sub-item 1                      |
|     + sub-item 1                        |                                         |
|     + sub-item 2                        |     -   sub-item 2                      |
|         - sub-sub-item 1                |                                         |
| ```                                     |         -   sub-sub-item 1              |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------+

```{=html}
<style type="text/css">
.heading-output {
  border-bottom: none;
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: 0;
}
</style>
```
